channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. Crude Oil Stockpiles Increased in Week Ended Sept. 6
item.description: U.S. crude oil inventories rose for the first time in four weeks, and gasoline and distillate stocks increased amid lower demand.

item.title: 15 companies that have rewarded long-term shareholders with high dividend income
item.description: It might be better for investors to build up dividend income over time than to chase high current yields.

item.title: How a Private-Equity Payday Drained a Hospital Chain of Cash
item.description: Steward Health Care recently went bust, years after paying a $790 million dividend to its shareholders.

item.title: Want inflation-protected income for your retirement years? Here’s how to get it.
item.description: Combining an annuity with Treasury-Inflation-Protected Securities (TIPS) is a winning strategy, but you have to do it yourself.

item.title: Retirees Will Get a Smaller Social Security Raise in 2025---and That's OK
item.description: Next year’s cost-of-living adjustment is expected to be 2.5% as inflation cools.

item.title: GameStop price target cut as analyst cites retailer’s lack of strategy
item.description: GameStop Corp. surprised investors with a quarterly profit in its second-quarter results Tuesday, but the videogame retailer still has many challenges...

item.title: Topgolf Sent Callaway Into the Rough
item.description: The recreational driving-range business has been a drag for the top golf-equipment maker.

item.title: More good news for Apple: iPhone 16 Pro deals look slightly better this year
item.description: Wireless carriers are offering bigger credits on this year’s Pro models than they did last year, which could help Apple drive more upgrades.

item.title: A Recession Signal Is Flashing Red. Or Is It?
item.description: When the yield curve turns positive, the country is usually about to plunge into recession. Hope this time relies on a few historical exceptions.

item.title: Betting markets flip to expecting a Harris win over Trump after debate
item.description: Kamala Harris’s prospects in the White House race have improved in the wake of Tuesday’s presidential debate, according to an average of betting marke...
